name: 2 Close
description:
Click on the Farm to gain Food

Click on the Lumber Mill to gain Wood

Click on the House to gain Villigars (costs 3 Food and 3 Wood)

Click on the Castle to gain Soldiers ( costs 1 Villigar, 10 Food and 10 Wood)

Click on the Axe PowerUp to gain 2x Wood for 10 sec(costs 10 Food)

Click on the Scythe PowerUp to gain 2x Food for 10 sec(costs 10 Wood)

The Faction with the most Points wins after 60 sec.

Score(Food + Wood + (Villigars * 50) + (Soldiers * 100))
